comments: Larry is cracks a few Evolution jokes but requires attendance for extra points. His exams are mutible choice but if you miss an exam the are makeups are all essay. His exams are one hour and comprehensive. He lectures and uses power points. Best get a used book he expects you to read the chapter. Larry makes himself available to students.
Great teacher, truly wants to help you out. Study what he teaches, not what is in the book- you\'ll be better off. He makes things simple and concise.
